questions.ex1Str: 작동행정은 연료유가 연소되어 발생한 열에너지가 크랭크축을 회전시켜 기계적 에너지로 바뀌는 행정이다.

questions.ex3Str: A : not more than 30s, B : 7 knots
questions.ex4Str: A : not more than 60s, B : 7 knots
questions.questionsStr: The auxiliary steering gear shall be capable of putting the rudder over from 15° on one side to 15° on the other side in ( A ) with the ship at its deepest seagoing draught and running ahead at one half of the maximum ahead service speed or ( B ), which is the greater.

In accordance with the SOLAS Convention as amended, a/an ( ) shall be provided to be operated from the engine control room or at the maneuvering platform as appropriate, and shall be clearly audible in the engineer's accommodation.
